title: Set of 15” Empi GT5 Chrome Alloys, with tyres

posts.content:
Empi GT5 chrome alloy wheels

Looking for £250 for the set.

For VW Type 2 Splitscreen, Beetle or Ghia

5x 205 stud pattern (PCD)


These came off my 1966 Splitscreen, but will fit other models of that period.


All wheels are straight, and in good condition. The chrome could do with a polish, but still looks great.


All centre caps are present and correct, with some age related marks to the logos but would scrub up ok.


Tyres are 4 matching Cooper tyres. 185/65/15. Plenty of tread on all of them, although some minor age related cracking on the sidewalls. No punctures or bulges.


Only selling as I have refurbed the original steel wheels on my splitty so no need for them and taking up storage!


Collection from near manningtree. Can arrange delivery at cost.

Any questions please ask
